>
> W=
hat killed the samurai class was their obsolete 
> role and drain on the ec=
onomy---samurai no longer and never did

ower classes, although as we now they

I think it was like that for most of the Edo period, although I=
 think
a good thesis paper idea would be to look at the Samurai of the Edo
=
period, and examine what factors kept them functioning as a class -
was it =
social, economic, or cultural?
